name: Friday The 13th: Return To Camp Blood (1998) FREE PC Game
name_original: Friday The 13th: Return To Camp Blood (1998) FREE PC Game
description:
--DESCRIPTION UNDER CONSTRUCTION--

Friday the 13th: Return To Camp Blood {release date: 1998, size: 1.11 MB}

Ahh, good memories. One of the first games I ever made. The original f13 fan game that created a cult following. Play as Jason & kill the campers. Arrow keys & space bar to play. Crappy graphics I made in mspaint and ripped sounds. I had a s**t load of fun making it. Just the idea of making my own video game was amazing to me. This was originally made in Klik N Play and then converted over to Click & Create.
